flawed_nl_solution:
He started off with 150 channels and they took 20 away and added 12 so he has 150-20+12 = <<150-20+12=139>>139 channels
He called and asked to reduce his 139 channels by 10 channels and added 8 sports channels so he now has 139-10+8 = <<139-10+8=137>>137 channels
He ordered the wrong sports package and the new one adds an additional 7 channels for a total of 137+7 = <<137+7=144>>144 channels
#### 144

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 142, not 139. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
